Text:
the forums say that this game doesnt have BCA protection, the game didn't work because it was a bad dump.  the NTSC version works fine, no BCA.

why the BCA code ????

has anyone tested this - does it work past level 2?
Yes ! I tested it on my NTSC wii and it works fine : ).. (2 seconds freeze on level 2 and that`s it ! )

inside the rar file a ISO file...how can iso file open i tried....magic iso..power iso.....ultra iso...win iso......all four iso opener software but i'm not able to open it......
PLS. help me to open it........thanks in advance............
How to open ISO File....pls..help.........thanks in advance............

How to open ISO file.......pls...help
thanks in advance.......

There is no need to open an ISO file, you just burn it on to a DVD and then insert it into your Wii.
But to play the game you need to modify you wii, either with some software or with a chip on you wii. 

Here is some links to a way to softmod your wii, but if you don't do it right you can break your wii. 
Firmware 3.1-4.1: http://www.wiihacks.com/recommended-faqs-guides-tutorials-only/16970-new-3-1-4-1-softmod-any-wii.html
Firmware 4.2: http://www.wiihacks.com/recommended-faqs-guides-tutorials-only/24630-hackmii-0-5-works-all-sys-menus-4-2-included.html

if your are completely unfamiliar with computers don't try this.
thank for this game works great ,i used wiiscrubber to take the 002 error of  then burned to dics with imgburn
